## Operation type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Operation =
  | {
      id: string;
      action: 'create' | 'remove';
      page: PdfPageObject;
      annotation: PdfAnnotationObject;
    }
  | {
      id: string;
      action: 'transform';
      page: PdfPageObject;
      annotation: PdfAnnotationObject;
      params: {
        offset: Position;
        scale: Size;
      };
    };
```
